content.text: Lionbuta is an animal who lives on the Island of Rare Animals. Like all the animals on the island, he is protected by Gaimon.
Lionbuta is a mixture of a lion and a pig, with a pink pig body and brown lion mane.
Not much of its personality is known, but it appears to be friendly as it is able to form a close bond with Gaimon.
Lionbuta was the first animal Luffy and Nami encountered on the Island of Rare Animals. He was seen again with a group of animals when Gaimon waved goodbye to the departing Straw Hats.
Lionbuta, Cocox, and Usagihebi were there to witness Buggy's crash-landing on the Island of Rare Animals and the subsequent battle between him and Gaimon.

sections.title: From the Decks of the World

content.text: Lionbuta was seen watching as the new inhabitant of the island, the barrel-woman Sarfunkel, fed Gaimon some food.

elements.text: Its name is a portmanteau between the words lion and buta (豚, Japanese for pig). This also corresponds to its appearance as a pig with a lion's mane.
